content: **due to popular demand i ve included the older version of this pattern revision 6 as well of note - revision 6 has only 2 charts while revision 9 has 3 charts chart a is the same between both versions chart b in revision 9 = row 1-15 of chart b in revision 6 chart c in revision 9 = row 17-27 in revision 6 primary changes are in the repeat structure and line by line directions ** this used nearly all of the 500 yards of esopus you may want to purchase an additional skein ** haruni is a triangular shawl worked from the top down and ends with a chain bind off worked with your knitting needles you can easily adjust the size of this shawl by knitting more or less repeats of the first chart pattern includes charts written directions and stitch count totals for every row **all translations can be found here** 1 scroll down to 6th questions thank to the generosity of the knitting community haruni is available in the following translations danish dutch finnish french german icelandic italian polish portuguese spanish swedish 1 https //knitterain com/faq html
